public class CLESABetweenOntologyEntities
extends CLESA
implements RelatednessBetweenOntologyEntities

Computes the semantic similarity between two ontology entities based on the CL-ESA metric

Jorge Gracia

getValue

public double getValue(java.lang.Object object1,
                       java.lang.Object element1,
                       java.lang.Object object2,
                       java.lang.Object element2)
Computes the CL-ESA-based relatedness value between two entities from two ontologies, documented in different languages. It performs elementary computations of CL-ESA to compare several features of the ontological description of the compared entities. Such features are combined by means of multilayer perceptrons (one for classes and another one for properties) to produce a final value.

Specified by:
getValue in interface Relatedness
Parameters:
object1 - URI of the source ontology
element1 - URI of the source entity
object2 - URI of the target ontology
element2 - URI of the target element
Returns:
cross-lingual relatedness value

                       java.lang.Object element1,
                       java.lang.String lang1,
                       java.lang.Object object2,
                       java.lang.Object element2,
                       java.lang.String lang2)
Description copied from interface: CLRelatedness
Gives the cross-lingual relatedness between two elements (URIs, words, ...) documented in different languages and coming from two different objects (ontologies, documents, etc.)

Specified by:
getValue in interface CLRelatedness
Parameters:
object1 - source object
element1 - element to compare inside the source object
lang1 - source language
object2 - target object
element2 - element to compare within the target object
lang2 - target language
Returns:
relatedness value
